info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 07 at 8:23PM PDT until September 10 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY FOR THIS EVENING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Highs up to 107 expected with lows in the mid 60s. * WHERE...In California, Central Siskiyou County and South Central Siskiyou County. In Oregon, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Jackson County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Smoke from area fires could impact the high temperature forecast this weekend. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.
